title: No Kids for You!
body: I've always thought having kids <em>should</em> be a privilege, not a right.  <a href="http://www.cnn.com/2004/LAW/05/08/conception.banned.ap/index.html">Now a judge in Rochester agrees with me</a> (from <a title="Synja" href="http://www.livejournal.com/users/synja/" >Jon</a>).  Apparently it's four strikes and you're out when it comes to having neglected crack-babies.  "I think what the judge is trying to do is kind of have a wake-up call for society," says Attorney Chris Affronti, who chairs the family law section of the Monroe County Bar Association.  Score +1 for society.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-05-10

No Kids for You!

I've always thought having kids should be a privilege, not a right.
